summary: Charlie swindled $10 billion from investors. He manages to slip away from FBI in LA but is spotted in Tijuana. FBI's not alone. Mexican and Russian gangsters want him, too.
cast: Aidan Quinn|Andy Garcia|Mario Van Peebles|Danny Pino|Gina Gershon|Luke Goss|Bokeem Woodbine|Claudia Ferri|Jordan Belfi|Gary Daniels|Geoffrey Ross|Daniel Faraldo|Raymond J. Barry|Elya Baskin|Corbin Bernsen|P.L. Brown|Ray Lykins|Vincent Rivera|Joe Ordaz|David Fernandez Jr.|Kenyon Glover|Chad Zuber|Melissa Baldridge|Eder López|Manuel Flores-Ruiz|Reuben Cardona|Denitza García|Abraham Guerrero Gutiérrez|Barbarella Pardo|Linda Wörndl|Bjørn Alexander|BJ Davis|Julia Davis|Michelle Jubilee Gonzalez|Iyad Hajjaj|Ray Mortier|Les Mumphrey
title: Across the Line: La huida de Charlie Wright
